## rotatePoint() function

Rotate the given point around the given center, by the given rotation (in degrees)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rotatePoint(point: PointXY, center: PointXY, rotation: number): RotatedPointXY;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  point | [PointXY](./util.pointxy.md) |  |
|  center | [PointXY](./util.pointxy.md) |  |
|  rotation | number |  An object consisting of the rotated point, followed by cos theta and sin theta. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[RotatedPointXY](./util.rotatedpointxy.md)
